text: Vibeke Westbye Skofterud (20 April 1980 – 29 July 2018) was a Norwegian cross country skier. Skofterud was born in Askim, Norway. She won gold in the 4 x 5 km relay at Vancouver in 2010. Her best individual finish at the Winter Olympics was 8th in the 30 km event at Salt Lake City in 2002. In 2008, Skofterud said she was openly lesbian.Skofterud står frem She suffered from eating disorders. Skofterud was killed in a jet skiing accident on 29 July 2018 in Arendal, Norway, aged 38.Skofterud omkommet i vannscooterulykke ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1980 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Skiing deaths Category:Norwegian skiers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Norway Category:Lesbians Category:LGBT sportspeople
title: Vibeke Skofterud
